text: George Thomas Turnipseed (August 27, 1936 â€“ March 6, 2020) was an American lawyer, politician and activist. He was a Democrat. From 1976 to 1980, he served as a member of the South Carolina Senate from the 8th district. Beginning in the late 1970s, he became active within the civil rights movement. Turnipseed was born in Mobile, Alabama. He married Judith Turnipseed in 1963. The couple had two children. He died on March 6, 2020 in Columbia, South Carolina of respiratory failure. He was 83. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American civil rights activists Category:Lawyers from Mobile, Alabama Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Disease-related deaths in South Carolina Category:Politicians from Mobile, Alabama Category:Politicians from South Carolina Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from South Carolina
title: Tom Turnipseed
